chapter.text: a l laoh sbath nung mekh ning at t ri k
haey avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha at t ri k chea avei noh
kuchea phkay del mean rosmei phluchenhchach
bokkol krob roub ku sotthote mean anak theroksaa ke
dau che neah chaur aoy mnoussa lok meul choh tha tae roubke trauv ban bangkeut mk pi avei
roubke trauv ban bangkeut mk pi tuk del banh chenh( pi bradeab phetborsa chaul tow knong bradeab phet sdrei)
del vea chenhpi chhaoengokhnang borsa ning chhaoengchomni sdrei
pitabrakd nasa trong chea anak mean anoupheap knong kar thveu aoy ke rsa laengvinh
now thngai del athrkambang teangoasa trauv ban leatatradeang
pelnoh ke kmean amnach haeyka kmean anak chuoy der
a l laoh sbath nung mekh del mean phlieng thleak mdong haey mdongtiet
ning phendei del meankar be reah bek( daoysaar roukkhcheate loutleasa)
pitabrakd nasa vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea peakyapech del mean karbengchek( rveang khosa ning trauv)
haey kompir kuor an ka minmen samreab lengsaech der
pitabrakd nasa puokke riebcham lbichakl akrak(daembi brachheang nung mou ham meat)
haey yeung ka mean phenkar( daembi tabt nung puokke)vinh der
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) ponyearpel aoy puok kmean chomnue ning rngcham meul puokke muoy ry sen choh
